title: Practice Challenge
description:
You have a list of temperatures in Celsius. Convert each to Fahrenheit and display it:
1. Given array: [0, 10, 20, 30, 40]
2. Use a for...of loop
3. For each temperature, convert to Fahrenheit: (celsius * 9/5) + 32
4. Display: '[celsius]°C is [fahrenheit]°F'

commonMistakes.correction:
Using 'in' instead of 'of':
   for (let fruit in fruits)  // WRONG - gives index, not item!
   for (let fruit of fruits)  // CORRECT - gives the item
   
   Confusing, right? Remember: 'of' for values, 'in' for keys (we'll learn later)
